General.Name: Makalot Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Makalot Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of garments for men, women, and children in Taiwan. It offers trousers and shorts, T-shirts, dresses, shirts, pajamas and underwear, sportswear, skirts, vests, knitwear, and jackets. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.550, Zhongxiao East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 110
